body_html:
Hi! Do you have any code that uses tf.device?
If not, then would it be practical for you to include your model code, please?
If the code above is your model, then my suspicion is using slim together with DistributionStrategy. I wouldn't think it was intended that way.

Something went very wrong to result in "Creating a partition for /device:CPU:7 which doesn't exist in the list of available devices. ".

body:
Hi!  Do you have any code that uses `tf.device`?
If not, then would it be practical for you to include your model code, please?
If the code above is your model, then my suspicion is using slim together with DistributionStrategy.  I wouldn't think it was intended that way.

Something went very wrong to result in "Creating a partition for /device:CPU:7 which doesn't exist in the list of available devices. ".
